scripts.start: npm run build && npm run minify && node server.js
scripts.start-dev: npm run watch & npm run live-reload & firebase serve --only hosting
scripts.mkdirs: mkdir -p static/scripts && mkdir -p static/css && cp index.html static/index.html
scripts.watch: npm run mkdirs && npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css
scripts.watch-js: watchify src/main.coffee --transform coffeeify --extension=".coffee" --verbose --debug -o '$(npm run exorcist)' | npm run exorcist
scripts.build: npm run mkdirs && npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.build-js: browserify src/main.coffee --transform coffeeify --extensions=".coffee" --debug | npm run exorcist
scripts.build-css: npm run copy-bootstrap-all && npm run sassify
scripts.copy-bootstrap-all: npm run copy-darkly && npm run copy-bootstrap && npm run copy-fonts
